Frequently Asked Questions

BYOK allows Pro subscribers to connect their own ElevenLabs API key to Produciesta. This gives you access to your personal ElevenLabs voice library, including any custom voices you've created. Your API usage is billed directly by ElevenLabs at their standard rates, giving you full control over your voice generation costs and capabilities.

No! Produciesta includes a built-in voice library that works out of the box. The BYOK feature is optional and only available to Pro subscribers who want to use their own ElevenLabs voices.

A generation is counted each time you generate audio for a scene. If you regenerate the same scene with different settings or voices, that counts as an additional generation. Pro subscribers have unlimited generations.

Yes, you can cancel anytime through your Apple ID subscription settings. You'll continue to have Pro access until the end of your billing period. After cancellation, you'll revert to the Free tier.

Subscriptions are handled through Apple's App Store, which has its own refund policies. If you're not satisfied, you can request a refund through Apple within their refund window.

Yes! Early adopters who subscribe during our launch period will lock in special pricing. Subscribe now to take advantage of these introductory rates before they increase.
